import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../assets/css/custom.css"; import SignUpModal from "./SignUpModal"; const LoginModal = ({ isOpen, onClose }) => { const [isSignUpOpen, setIsSignUpOpen] = useState(false); if (!isOpen) return null; const handleSignUpClick = () => { setIsSignUpOpen(true); }; const handleSignUpClose = () => { setIsSignUpOpen(false); }; return ( <>
